mapper.insert:
insert into mall_pms.pms_category_brand_relation(brand_id, catelog_id, brand_name, catelog_name) values
(#{entity.brandId}, #{entity.catelogId}, #{entity.brandName}, #{entity.catelogName})

insert into mall_pms.pms_category_brand_relation(brand_id, catelog_id, brand_name, catelog_name) values
(#{entity.brandId}, #{entity.catelogId}, #{entity.brandName}, #{entity.catelogName})
on duplicate key update brand_id = values(brand_id) , catelog_id = values(catelog_id) , brand_name = values(brand_name) , catelog_name = values(catelog_name)
